review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2021
name: vfs
title: 3 Organic Pineapples ROTTEN to the core 4 days after delivery
review: I'm detoxing and fresh high quality produce is essential. I ordered 3 organic pineapples and 4 days later while attempting to cut/core discovered all 3 had mold on the inside & in the outside skin. I'm beyond disgusted considering how much consumers have confidence that we're paying for & getting the quality in produce. This rotten produce also had a distinct foul odor.Never again will I allow Whole Foods to select/deliver my fresh foods & produce

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2021
name: Rita Review
title: Looked perfect, but had to toss it!
review: The crown was beautiful, no limp leaves.There was a small area developing pineapple color, otherwise it was firm and very green.As expected it needed to "hang out" on the counter for a couple of days until it ripened.But it didn't "ripen" as expected: it went from not ripe to rotten.I tried cutting it anyway and salvage what I could but even the semi-good pieces (darker color, taste of alcohol developing, not that sweet but not rotten) went bad in the refrigerator the next day.The months for good pineapples is upon us so I though it was safe to try it.Hard to buy this kind of product without "seeing, smelling and pinching".Will buy many more pineapples, but not until I can go into the store!
